```python
def transform(sequence):

The pattern seems to be doubling the first 7 characters of the sequence. Here is the corrected Python function.

```python
def transform(sequence):
    first_seven = sequence[:7]
    sequence = sequence.replace(first_seven, first_seven + first_seven, 1)
    return sequence
```
